attributes.action: A full referendum to end the TV Licence once and for all.
attributes.additional_details: Most of us have to Pay twice for BBC as we have sky or cable.
attributes.background: and allow those funded by the licence to show adverts tomraise revenue. As the public are fed up of paying for either repeated programming and poor quality programming due to budget restrictions forced by HM Government'd cut back of funding

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you'd like there to be a referendum on whether or not people should have to pay the TV Licence fee, you could start a petition about that.
